items.name: Dead Plant
items.reasonForRemoval: It lived a short life full of empty watercans
items.comments: Give me your plants if you hate them

motivationalQuotes.quote: Let go of what does not make you happy.
motivationalQuotes.author: Unbekannt

motivationalQuotes.quote: We often carry a lot of unnecessary burden with us. Let it go.
motivationalQuotes.author: Marie Kondo

motivationalQuotes.quote: The more things you own, the more they own you.
motivationalQuotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

motivationalQuotes.quote: We often collect things because we hope they will make us happy someday. But happiness does not lie in things, it lies within ourselves.
motivationalQuotes.author: Marc and Angel Chernoff

motivationalQuotes.quote: A tidy room means a tidy mind.
motivationalQuotes.author: Marie Kondo

motivationalQuotes.quote: Tidy your space, transform your life.
motivationalQuotes.author: Marie Kondo

motivationalQuotes.quote: Simplicity is the key to happiness.
motivationalQuotes.author: Lao Tzu

motivationalQuotes.quote: We often need less than we think.
motivationalQuotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

motivationalQuotes.quote: We cannot add more until we have taken away what we no longer need.
motivationalQuotes.author: Lao Tzu
